ll <- list(a = 1, b = 2, c= list(d = c(1,2,3), e = "hello"))

## 日期 {#sec:date}

`cut.Date()` 是一个泛型函数

```{r}
# 上个季度最后一天
# https://d.cosx.org/d/421162/16
as.Date(cut(as.Date(c("2001-02-01", "2001-05-02")), "quarter")) - 1
```

S3 方法

```{r}
methods(cut)
```
